original_text: The name of his firstborn son was Joel. The name of his second son was Abijah. They were judges in Beersheba town.
korean_text: 장자의 이름은 요엘이요 차자의 이름은 아비야라 그들이 브엘세바에서 사사가 되니라

sentences.original_text: The name of his firstborn son was Joel.
The name of his second son was Abijah.
They were judges in Beersheba town.
